snippet.title: WHY EVERY GAME NEEDS A GRAPPLE HOOK
snippet.description:
One of the many additions to the newest update in GTTOD is the Grappling Hook. You can use the grappling hook for standard stuff like swinging through the map, saving yourself from a nasty fall, or closing the gap between you and your enemy in style. It's not just a tool for getting around; it's a game-changer that can turn the tide of battle in your favor.

The newest update to GTTOD is MASSIVE and if you haven't checked it out yet and want to know what it's about, then turn on our notis 🔔 because a full gameplay vid of the new update is coming soon! 

Want to join the community? Click here: https://discord.gg/xe2wartp
Need more GTTOD content? We've got you: https://linktr.ee/gttod

More info on the update: https://www.reddit.com/r/GTTOD/comments/16lzpql/update_11_with_biggest_content_drop_yet_is_live/
